summary: A hardworking, focused and determined artist looking to obtain a full-time position as a Graphic Designer.

experience.title: Multimedia Designer and Graphic Designer
experience.description: Worked on branding and logo design for the office as well as inside designing of templates for the office's online services. Consulted with clients on poster designs for their conferences and presentations to their leadership Boards.

experience.title: Graphic Designer/ Promoter
experience.description: Helped the management team with future events and promotional tactics along with designing promotional materials and designed flyer's.

experience.title: FreeLance Graphic Designer
experience.description: Created graphics for pamphlets, banners, screen graphics and web graphics for the church. Helped with film design and created after effects bumps for message series.

experience.title: Free Lance Digital/Graphic Designer
experience.description: Freelance designed for networked Clients upon request.

education.degree: Bachelor's of Fine Arts (B.F.A), Digital Art & Design
